RT ♡ Charlotte Fang 🪲 Crown Prince ❀ LOVE HEALS 💞
The global fertility crisis is a material crisis, not cultural or spiritual, but the obstinate hysterics is because they’re propagandized to navigate against a simple politically inconvenient truth: cratering birthrate is symptom of female workforce involvement. 
The earlier…

Kitten 💖🐈: Whenever I talk about the decline of marriage and family, people divebomb the thread to say that it's all caused by material concerns, usually housing but also sometimes wages or taxes
What causes this? How do so many end up with such an upside-down view of the world?
